section.title: &kw-hos-tm; &kw-hos-version-50;: Point-in-Time Swift Rings Recovery

para.para: In this situation, everything is still running (lifecycle manager, control plane nodes, and compute nodes) but you want to restore your Swift rings to a previous state.

section.para: In this scenario, everything is still running (lifecycle manager, control plane nodes, and compute nodes) but you want to restore your Swift rings to a previous state.

listitem.para: Log in to the first Swift Proxy (SWF-PRX[0]) node.
Get the id corresponding to the job HLM Default: Swift restore from Swift.
This will take some time. While you wait you can follow the progress in the /var/log/freezer-agent/freezer-scheduler.log log file.
Log in to the lifecycle manager.
Log back in to the first Swift Proxy (SWF-PRX[0]) node.
Log back in to the lifecycle manager.

sidebar.title: Restore from an SSH backup
sidebar.para: Follow the same procedure as for Swift in the section immediately preceding this one, but select the job HLM Default: Swift restore from SSH.
